description.en: A mesmerizing exploration of light passing through glass, splitting into a vivid rainbow of colors through the physics of refraction.

prompt: A high-quality cinematic shot of a triangular glass prism on a dark surface, a single beam of white light hitting the edge and refracting into a brilliant, sharp rainbow spectrum, caustic light patterns, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, ethereal atmosphere.
